description: A massive colosseum in Dressrosa where gladiatorial battles are held. The tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi is taking place here.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Reunites with Bellamy at the Colosseum
keyEvents.description: Luffy encounters Bellamy at the Corrida Colosseum for the first time since Jaya, showing Bellamy's character development and changed attitude.
keyEvents.significance: The Colosseum serves as the setting for important character reunions and the ongoing tournament battles.

keyEvents.title: Bartolomeo Enters Block B Arena
keyEvents.description: Bartolomeo makes his dramatic entrance into the Block B battle, establishing himself as a major competitor with a 150 million berry bounty.
keyEvents.significance: The arena showcases powerful fighters and advances the tournament storyline.

description: A small island northeast of Dressrosa connected by an iron bridge. Known for dangerous fighting fish and mysterious circumstances - reportedly, no one who has used the iron bridge has ever returned.

keyEvents.title: Law's Team Learns About Green Bit
keyEvents.description: The Caesar handover team discusses Green Bit at a cafe, learning about its dangers including fighting fish and the mysterious iron bridge. Law insists on using it as the drop-off location despite warnings.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up Green Bit as a dangerous location and builds tension for the upcoming Caesar exchange with Doflamingo.

statusHistory.reason: Island's full nature not yet explored

name.japanese: サウザンド・サニー号

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky using treasure tree Adam wood. Currently docked near Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Mysterious Noises on the Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: The crew members guarding the ship (Nami, Chopper, Brook, Momonosuke) hear strange noises coming from inside the Thousand Sunny while playing Shogun.
keyEvents.significance: Creates suspense and foreshadows a potential threat or intruder on the ship.

statusHistory.reason: Currently serving as the Straw Hat Pirates' ship

description: An island kingdom in the New World ruled by Donquixote Doflamingo. Known as the 'Country of Love and Passion,' it has a vibrant culture but hides dark secrets.

keyEvents.title: CP0 Agents Debut in Dressrosa
keyEvents.description: CP0 agents including Guernika, Joseph, and Gismonda make their first appearance, observing events on the island.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes World Government presence and surveillance in Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Encounters Wicca the Dwarf
keyEvents.description: Zoro chases a 'fairy' (actually Wicca, a Tontatta dwarf) who stole his sword through the streets of Dressrosa.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the Tontatta dwarves and begins revealing Dressrosa's hidden secrets.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Rescues Kin'emon from Doflamingo's Agents
keyEvents.description: Kin'emon is surrounded by Doflamingo's men in Dressrosa. Sanji arrives and defeats a sniper, rescuing him.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the danger posed by Doflamingo's network throughout the island.

statusHistory.reason: Currently under Doflamingo's rule, Straw Hats and allies active on the island
